casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jennifer JIMENEZ/April Myers 22P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of January 2019 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
